item.title: How Password Storage Fails: A Security Timeline Every Defender Should Know
item.description: Storing passwords safely is a really important part of running any website or app where people create accounts. When this is done badly, it has led to some of the biggest data leaks ever. Even years later, stolen passwords are still being reused by attackers to break into other accounts. Below are six common ways passwords have been handled over time, starting with the worst ideas and moving toward safer ones, explained in a simple way.
